greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Largest solution x to phi(x) + 1 = prime(n).
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
D. Bressoud, CNT.m Computational Number Theory Mathematica package.
mathematica: Needs["CNT`"]; Table[Solve[EulerPhi[x] == Prime[n] - 1, x][[-1, -1, -1]], {n, 100}] (* _T. D. Noe_, Nov 07 2011 *)
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Dec 03 2001
